name: zkBob
intro: A stablecoin-based zkprotocol designed for simplicity, privacy and utility
introduce: zkBob simplifies secure, limited-value, and anonymous stablecoin transfers for everyday users. The application accepts BOB, a multi-chain stable token (stablecoin) enhanced with optional privacy features. Once BOB is deposited in the zkBob app, pool participants can transfer any amount* of BOB amongst themselves in a private, secure manner without needing to connect MetaMask, WalletConnect or any Web3 wallet.
